Then you should file a bug with "ubuntu-bug xserver-xorg-video-intel" and describe your suspend issue. In the mean time you can disable suspend with by edit the file /usr/share/polkit-1/actions/org.freedesktop.upower.policy Where it says "yes" you edit to "no"
